title: Mahindra Auto sales up 9% in August at 76,755 units
description: Mahindra & Mahindra reported a 9% year-on-year increase in total wholesales to 76,755 units in August, with domestic passenger vehicle sales up 16% and exports rising 26%. Total tractor sales saw a 1% increase. The company anticipates further growth driven by favorable conditions for the upcoming festive season and agricultural factors.
